---
category: news
title: "Genetic Mechanism Revealed of Age-Related Macular Degeneration Based on Fusion of Statistics and Machine Learning Method"
excerpt: "Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) is the most common cause of irreversible vision loss in the developed world which affects the quality of life for millions of elderly individuals worldwide. Genome-wide association studies (GWAS) have identified genetic variants at 34 loci contributing to AMD."
